title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Avalanche (AVAX) Drops 4.5%, Leading Index Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Polkadot (DOT) was also an underperformer, declining 3.7%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2712.19, down 1.0% (-26.22) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

Three of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BCH (+1.0%) and LINK (+0.6%).

Laggards: AVAX (-4.5%) and DOT (-3.7%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index declined 1.0% with most assets trading lower, led by significant drops in AVAX (-4.5%) and DOT (-3.7%).
